title: Imaginary Homelands - passage is best described as

content.prompt: Taken as a whole, the passage is best described as

choices.label: a reflection on changes in India during the mid- to late twentieth century
a reminiscence of characters who shaped the author’s childhood
a discourse on the experience of alienation in immigrant populations
an analysis of the circumstances and emotions that inspired the author’s work

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
